messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: SUV's
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 2/2/01 10:40:15 AM Pacific Standard Time, lurine@softcom.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/2/01 10:40:15 AM Pacific Standard Time,
lurine@... writes:

<< As one who owned an 4-bys long before they became "in" and known as SUVs, I
think anyone who buys one should be required to take a behind-the-wheel
driving test in the SUV before they are allowed to buy one! >>


Well, I don't use my SUV to haul anything but kids. And no, I don't use it as
SUVs were originally intended to be used, but it's a legal product and I paid
for it, so I'm okay with that. <g>

BTW, I *do* like the way it looks, but I would much rather be riding around
in a sporty little two-seater, with the top down.

candice
(who can't be taken too seriously because she hasn't had her extra caramel
latte yet)
